content: venusray s lilly lunch bag materials cotton yarn i used lily sugar n cream solid yarns colors hot purple ecru rose pink jute size h crochet hook 1 wood round bead with large hole for drawstring stopper abbreviations chain chain sl slip single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet esc extended single_crochet st/sts stitch/stitches * * - repeat the instructions pattern base round 1 make a magic_ring chain count ad a half_double_crochet 8 half_double_crochet in the ring join with a slip_stitch 9sts round 2 ch2 count as 1hdc 1 half_double_crochet in the same st 2 half_double_crochet in each stitch around join with a slip_stitch 18 sts round 3 ch2 count as 1hdc 1 half_double_crochet in the same st 1hdc in next st * 2 half_double_crochet in next st 1hdc in next st * repeat from * join with a slip_stitch 27 sts round 4 ch2 count as 1hdc 1 half_double_crochet in the same st 1hdc in next 2 sts * 2 half_double_crochet in next st 1hdc in next 2 sts * repeat from * join with a slip_stitch 36 sts round 5 ch2 count as 1hdc 1 half_double_crochet in the same st 1hdc in next 3 sts * 2hdc in next st 1hdc in next 3 sts * repeat from * join with a slip_stitch 45 sts round 6 ch2 count as 1hdc 1 half_double_crochet in the same st 1hdc in next 4 sts * 2hdc in next st 1hdc in next 4 sts * repeat from * join with a slip_stitch 54 sts round 7 ch2 count as 1hdc 1 half_double_crochet in the same st 1hdc in next 5 sts * 2hdc in next st 1hdc in next 5 sts * repeat from * join with a slip_stitch 63 sts body round 8 ch2 count as 1dc 2 double_crochet in same st skip 2 sts * 3 double_crochet in next st * repeat from * join with a slip_stitch round 9 ch2 skip next 2 sts 3 double_crochet in space between the shell skip 2 sts repeat from * around 2 double_crochet at the end of round and connect it to the ch2 at the beginning of the round with a slip_stitch round 10 ch2 count as 1dc 2 double_crochet in space between the shell skip 2 sts repeat from * join with a slip_stitch round 11 13 15 17 repeat round 9 i switch color at round 13 round 12 14 16 repeat round 10 round 22 change color back to main color do single_crochet in each stitch round 23 - 34 half_double_crochet in each stitch i change color in row 28 29 and use single_crochet instead of half_double_crochet these row define how tall you want your bag to be for example 12 row is about 4 inches round 35 switch color do single_crochet in each stitch drawstring i use the half i-cord to make the draw string i found a youtube vdo for help of how to make the half i- cord here https //youtube com/shorts/timxudarllo si=iyrno_jfgqjihroc flowers magic_ring 5sc
